__e: Rain and mud in winter... dust in summer.
Rain and mud in winter. In summer, you couldn't breathe for the dust.
Lost their trail in the rain and the dark.
Here I make rain and I make the sun shine.
I've seen the rain and the sun at a time.
You ain't got the authority to declare "happy birthday"! Not in this town!
All it needs is some time, a little bit of sunshine and rain, and voilà!
You ain't got the authority to declare "happy birthday"! Not in this town!
There are only two things to do on rainy days, and I don't like to play cards.
You're right. And there's liable to be bullets flyin' around this way any minute, so I'd advise you to get inside, off the street.
Gotta say I don't see how with all the rain lately.
Drip it on the audience. That was my thought.

When I took you out riding, come rain or shine, because I knew it was right for you, when I got the bairns off your back just to give you a bit o' peace, when I saw you safe from home to home when you didn't even know if I was there,
In case of simple rain or lack of sun, NO.
